section.title: EVMAssignPolicy
section.para: EVMAssignPolicy assigns a policy (policyId) to a host (hostId).

listitem.para: Input: The ID of a host existing in the VMDB and the ID of a policy instance assigned to that host.
Output: Boolean in the form of true or false.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMAssignPolicy usage:

example.title: EVMAssignPolicy WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMAssignPolicy"> <part name="policyGuid" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="hostGuid" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="EVMAssignPolicyResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean" /> </message>

example.title: EVMAssignPolicy Output (Java)
example.screen: Calling EVMAssignPolicy Policy: env_prod, Host: AcmeVista Result: true Calling EVMAssignPolicy Policy: env_prod_vm_host, Host: AcmeVista Result: true Calling EVMAssignPolicy Policy: hardware_cpus, Host: AcmeVista Result: true
